alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 12:17AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Jackson, southwestern Tillman, Foard, northern Knox, Wilbarger, northwestern Baylor and southeastern Hardeman Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1216 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Odell to near Crowell to 6 miles southeast of Chalk. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Frederick, Crowell, Chillicothe, Davidson, Hollister, Thalia, Gilliland, Margaret, Lockett, Medicine Mound, Fargo, Odell, Oklaunion, Truscott, Grayback, Rayland, and Copper Breaks State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
